EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Event_CFPlatform_Q214.Follow Up - All v2
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Foundry Summit - Over 1000 Fired Up Attendees Dug in Over Three Days!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://cfsummit.com/> Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
The first Cloud Foundry Summit fueled by the support of the Cloud Foundry Foundation has wrapped—and what a difference the power of the ecosystem made!
"Open source has become a very effective approach to enable people to come together and build a standard platform." — Paul Maritz, CEO, Pivotal
Real customers who have deployed both Cloud Foundry and Pivotal CF showed up to share their successes to an audience of 1000 enthusiastic cloud developers and operators. Check out some session highlights here <http://www.gopivotal.com/platform-as-a-service/cloud-foundry-summit-2014>. Close to 60 keynotes, sessions, panels and tracks will continue to be released over the next several weeks.
Highlights:
- Pivotal Blog Wrap-up: The 3 Reasons Why the #CFSummit Rocked <http://blog.gopivotal.com/cloud-foundry-pivotal/p-o-v/field-report-the-3-reasons-why-the-cfsummit-rocked> - SAP Hybris - Commerce as a Service <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A8kEfY7bA_8> - Monsanto - Enabling Cloud Capabilities Through an Enterprise PaaS <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RJCB7OGeY9o&> - Diego: Re-envisioning the Elastic Runtime <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1OkmVTFhfLY>
Cloud computing is no longer just about infrastructure. It's about the opportunity to build great software and deliver great end-user experiences. Cloud Foundry is a leader in this movement. Thanks to all of you for being part of the community.
The Pivotal Team
